segments.text: I'm watching this family moment unfold in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in the apron is drying dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is a disasterâ€”water overflowing everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ruining the cabinets and flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, oblivious, which is frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are up to no good on the other side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on a stool that's tilting backward dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar like it's his personal stash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, hand out, enabling the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be sneaking snacks without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is so serene and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast makes the inside chaos even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're all so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR
